name.description: The unique name of the extension. Use lowercase, numbers, and dashes.

description.description: A short description of the extension.

mcpServers.description: A map of MCP servers to their configurations.

command.description: The command to run the MCP server (e.g., 'node', 'python').

args.description: Arguments passed to the MCP server command.

env.description: Environment variables for the MCP server.

contextFileName.description: The name of the file that contains the context for the extension. If omitted, the CLI defaults to GEMINI.md.

items.description: Tool names to exclude, or command-specific restrictions like 'run_shell_command(rm -rf)'.

excludeTools.description: An array of tool names to block from the model's access.

settings.description: User-defined settings that the CLI will prompt for upon installation.

description.description: Description of the setting shown to the user.

envVar.description: The environment variable name to store the setting value in.

sensitive.description: If true, the value is stored securely and obfuscated in logs.

commands.description: Explicitly defined custom commands provided by the extension.

path.description: Path to the .toml command definition file relative to the extension root.
